Package org.codeandmagic.timeline

Interface Summary
AxisLocator Interface implemented by classes responsible with computing the axis positions in the visible "frame".
AxisRenderer  
BackgroundRenderer Interface for classes that are responsible with rendering the background for the current "frame".
EventDetailsRenderer  
EventHorizontalLocator Interface implemented by the class responsible of calculating the horizontal positioning of a set of Events on a timeline.
EventIconRenderer Interface for class responsible with rendering the Event icons onto the timeline.
EventsChangeListener  
EventVerticalLocator Interface implemented by the class responsible of calculating the vertical positioning of a set of Events on a timeline.
StaticEventIconRenderer.EventLabelFormat A StaticEventIconRenderer.EventLabelFormat can be injected into a StaticEventIconRenderer to determine what label to draw next to the event icon;
TimelineViewAware  
 

Class Summary
AxisLocator.AxisHint  
ColorBackgroundRenderer BackgroundRenderer that draws a solid color onto the canvas.
DefaultAxisRenderer  
DiagonalVerticalLocator An EventVerticalLocator which displays all events diagonally no matter the horizontal distance between them.
DodgeVerticalLocator Implementation of EventVerticalLocator in which events tend to be positioned on the middle of the available vertical space.
DynamicEventIconRenderer Abstract subclass of StaticEventIconRenderer which provides a few simplifications for subclasses that have different images for different types of events.
Event  
Events  
ImagePerClassIconRenderer DynamicEventIconRenderer that
LinearAxisLocator AxisLocator that positions the axes temporary linear, similar with how LinearHorizontalLocator positions Events.
LinearHorizontalLocator EventHorizontalLocator which positions Events linearly based on a provided scaling factor.
MiddleVerticalLocator Basic implementation for EventVerticalLocator which positions all events on the vertical middle of the timeline view.
PopupEventRenderer  
PrecachedHorizontalLocator EventHorizontalLocator which pre-calculates the position of all event
PrecachedVerticalLocator  
StaticEventIconRenderer Implementation of EventIconRenderer that draws an image for the event and optionally a text.
This class performs the actual rendering and also the collision detection.
StaticEventIconRenderer.NameEventLabelFormat An StaticEventIconRenderer.EventLabelFormat that return the event name.
StaticEventIconRenderer.TimeAndNameEventLabelFormat Subclass of StaticEventIconRenderer.NameEventLabelFormat that in addition to the Event name, it also displays the date of the event
TimelineActivity  
TimelineRenderingContext  
TimelineView
